values.text: Hello, my name is <strong>Minerva! I am a chatbot created to help users manage their water usage by providing them with useful information. Based on Lolly, a character from Nintendo's game Animal Crossing and whose phrase is "bonbon!", the concept of Minerva is to act as a mascot of the user to encourage them to save water. Animals are also affected due to misuse of water. We chose a cat because... who does not love cats? </s>
What's yours?

Vamos a agregar mas recursos extras a lo que vamos encontrando mas aplicaciones para el manajo del agua que sean gratuitas, como a√±adido the recomendamos usar apps como Notion para crear tus propias plantillas para administrar tu uso del agua!

<a href="http://www.fao.org/aquastat/statistics/query/index.html">Aquastat is " the FAO global information system on water resources and agricultural water management. It collects, analyses and provides free access to over 180 variables and indicators by country from 1960. AQUASTAT draws on national capacities and expertise with an emphasis on Africa, the Near East, countries of the former Soviet Union, Asia, and Latin America and the Caribbean. AQUASTAT plays a key role in the monitoring of the Sustainable Development Goal 6 that sets out to "ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all", and in particular indicators of target 6.4 on water stress and water use efficiency."<a/>
¬°Que bueno, bonbon!
